SELECT M1.SAP_PLNT_VAL /* SAP플랜트값 */ , M1.SAP_MAT_CD /* SAP자재코드 */ , M1.SAP_MAT_NM /* SAP자재명 */ , M1.SAP_MAT_TP_VAL /* SAP자재유형값 */ , M1.SAP_MAT_GRP_VAL /* SAP자재그룹값 */ , M1.SAP_MAT_BAS_UNIT_VAL /* SAP자재기본단위값 */ , M1.SAP_PDCT_SCLSRT_STRC_VAL /* SAP제품계층구조값 */ , M1.MODEL_NO /* 모델번호 */ , M1.SAP_MAT_EVL_CLSS_VAL /* SAP자재평가클래스값 */ , NVL(F_CMZ_CD_NM(#{session.tenantId}, 'SAP_PLNT_CD', M1.SAP_PLNT_VAL) ,F_CMZ_CD_NM(#{session.tenantId}, 'CO_SAP_PLNT_CD', M1.SAP_PLNT_VAL)) AS SAP_PLNT_NM /* 플랜트명 */ FROM TB_GBCO_SAP_MAT_RCV_IZ M1 /* SAP자재수신내역 */ WHERE M1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' /* 데이터삭제여부 */ AND M1.USE_YN != 'X' AND ( M1.SAP_PLNT_VAL BETWEEN '2015' AND '2016' OR M1.SAP_PLNT_VAL BETWEEN '2107' AND '2109' )
AND UPPER(M1.SAP_MAT_CD) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{dto.searchKeyword}) || '%' /* SAP자재코드 */
AND UPPER(M1.SAP_MAT_NM) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{dto.searchKeyword}) || '%' /* SAP자재명 */
ORDER BY M1.SAP_MAT_CD, M1.SAP_PLNT_VAL

SELECT M1.SAP_PLNT_VAL /* SAP플랜트값 */ , M1.SAP_MAT_CD /* SAP자재코드 */ , M1.SAP_MAT_NM /* SAP자재명 */ , M1.SAP_MAT_TP_VAL /* SAP자재유형값 */ , M1.SAP_MAT_GRP_VAL /* SAP자재그룹값 */ , M1.SAP_MAT_BAS_UNIT_VAL /* SAP자재기본단위값 */ , M1.SAP_PDCT_SCLSRT_STRC_VAL /* SAP제품계층구조값 */ , M1.MODEL_NO /* 모델번호 */ , M1.SAP_MAT_EVL_CLSS_VAL /* SAP자재평가클래스값 */ FROM TB_GBCO_SAP_MAT_RCV_IZ M1 /* SAP자재수신내역 */ INNER JOIN T_CMZ_CD_D C1 ON M1.SAP_PLNT_VAL = C1.CD_VLD_VAL AND C1.CD_ID = 'SAP_PLNT_CD' AND C1.DEL_YN ='N' AND C1.CD_USE_YN = 'Y' AND C1.TENANT_ID IN ('TNT_WELLS') WHERE M1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' /* 데이터삭제여부 */ AND M1.USE_YN != 'X' AND ( M1.SAP_PLNT_VAL BETWEEN '2015' AND '2016' OR M1.SAP_PLNT_VAL BETWEEN '2107' AND '2109' ) AND UPPER(M1.SAP_MAT_CD) = UPPER(#{sapMatCd}) /* SAP자재코드 */

WITH VIEW_TBL AS ( SELECT COUNT(1) AS CNT, MAX(PD_NM) AS PD_NM FROM TB_PDBS_PD_BAS /* 상품기본 */ WHERE PD_TP_CD = 'M' AND DTA_DL_YN ='N'
AND SAP_MAT_CD = #{sapMatCd} /* Insert Data */
AND PD_CD != #{pdCd} /* 자기 자신은 중복체크 열외 - Update Data */ AND SAP_MAT_CD = #{sapMatCd}
AND ROWNUM = 1 ) SELECT CASE WHEN CNT = 0 THEN 'N' ELSE PD_NM END FROM VIEW_TBL

SELECT M1.SAP_PLNT_VAL /* SAP플랜트값 */ , M1.SAP_MAT_CD /* SAP자재코드 */ , M1.SAP_MAT_NM /* SAP자재명 */ , M1.SAP_MAT_TP_VAL /* SAP자재유형값 */ , M1.SAP_MAT_GRP_VAL /* SAP자재그룹값 */ , M1.SAP_MAT_BAS_UNIT_VAL /* SAP자재기본단위값 */ , M1.SAP_PDCT_SCLSRT_STRC_VAL /* SAP제품계층구조값 */ , M1.MODEL_NO /* 모델번호 */ , M1.SAP_MAT_EVL_CLSS_VAL /* SAP자재평가클래스값 */ FROM TB_GBCO_SAP_MAT_RCV_IZ M1 /* SAP자재수신내역 */ INNER JOIN T_CMZ_CD_D C1 ON M1.SAP_PLNT_VAL = C1.CD_VLD_VAL AND C1.CD_ID = 'SAP_PLNT_CD' AND C1.DEL_YN ='N' AND C1.CD_USE_YN = 'Y' AND C1.TENANT_ID IN ('TNT_WELLS') WHERE M1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' /* 데이터삭제여부 */ AND M1.USE_YN != 'X' AND ( M1.SAP_PLNT_VAL BETWEEN '2015' AND '2016' OR M1.SAP_PLNT_VAL BETWEEN '2107' AND '2109' ) AND UPPER(M1.SAP_MAT_CD) = UPPER(#{sapMatCd}) /* SAP자재코드 */
AND UPPER(M1.SAP_PLNT_VAL) = UPPER(#{sapPlntVal})
